lead_paragraph: The ethics committee chairmen, Michael J. Garcia and Hans-Joachim Eckert, will let an auditor decide whether to release Garcia’s findings to FIFA’s executive committee.
snippet: The ethics committee chairmen, Michael J. Garcia and Hans-Joachim Eckert, will let an auditor decide whether to release Garcia’s findings to FIFA’s executive committee.
